description: A bespoke power cell designed specifically for a rare and valuable type of prototype mech, using anomalous technology to burn exotic energy sources, with spatial anomaly technology in the machine itself increasing efficiency.  Even then, it requires a lot of esoteric essence to make each power cell, and they need to be taken apart and remade once depleted.
//: Quadruple the value of five crystallized essence, due to use of distortion amplifier motor and temporal stimulation in the mech.
